Writings

Writings

These are some notes I wrote down starting from 2018. It was a way of documenting the way I thought about things then and how I understood things. A way to explain to myself. These are mostly unoriginal notes of sorts and in my opinion you are better off reading a textbook instead. Apologies for typos and such.

The dates in the files are the date of last editing. Unfortunately I did not keep track of when the files were created (my computer does remember however, but it seems to be an unneccessary effort at this point).

I have tried to provide the appropriate references wherever possible. (Often I have linked an online resource using hyperlinks and this may not show up on your browser, however you could try clicking the title of the reference so listed; sorry about that. If it doesn't work, send me an email :)

Algebra

Topology and geometry

Others
Notes on ODEs Sturm-Liouville theory I made some tea

When \(a \ne 0\), there are two solutions to \(ax^2 + bx + c = 0 \hookrightarrow \) and they are $$x = {-b \pm \sqrt{b^2-4ac} \over 2a}.$$
